# Zensical Migration Dependency Checklist

Use this checklist to track all dependencies required for safe migration.

## 1) Tooling dependencies

- [ ] Build toolchain pinned and documented.
- [ ] Lint/link check commands stable.
- [ ] Preview workflow dependency versions pinned.
- [ ] Production deploy workflow dependencies validated.

## 2) Content dependencies

- [ ] Core navigation pages mapped and present.
- [ ] Template library entries updated.
- [ ] Asset paths (images/timelines) verified.
- [ ] Cross-links in README and key docs verified.

## 3) Process dependencies

- [ ] Readiness rubric completed.
- [ ] Preflight checklist completed.
- [ ] Runbook and rollback checklist prepared.
- [ ] Communication template prepared for stakeholders.

## 4) Ownership dependencies

- [ ] Migration owner assigned.
- [ ] Verification owner assigned.
- [ ] Rollback owner assigned.
- [ ] Communication owner assigned.
